title: Story
description: Stories reprecent the events story arc. Stories might represent complete a story arc consisting of sub stories or simple encounters

id.description: The unique identifier of a story

setting.description: The setting that this story belongs to

name.description: The unique name of this story

description.description: A description short description for game masters and extra's about the story

plot.description: The actual content of the story

type.description: The type of experience that this story offers.

gameMasters.description: The game masters responsible for this story

audience.description: The characters that this story tries to cater to

dependsOn.description: Any other story that should have bean completed in order to run this story. Normaly used to link encounters into a logic chain to make sure that al information reached the charachter

participatingCharacters.description: The characters actualy participating in this story. e.g. whent allong on the encounter.

items.description: Items that might be earned by characters during this story

conditions.description: Conditions that might be obtained by characters druing this story

startDate.description: The moment that this stroy should stat

endData.description: The moment that this story should end

location.description: The place within the location that is used for the story

extras.description: The extra's that are asigned to this story

minimumExtras.description: the amount of extras that is required at minimum to run this story

optimalExtras.description: The amount of extra's that the game master would like to have for this story

critical.description: Wheter or not this story is critial to the even propogation. In other words if it can be canceled or shuffeld around
